title: 872 90 "A Desperate Situation! The Iron-tight Entrapment of Luffy!"Transliteration: "Zettai Zetsumei – Teppeki no Rufi Hōimō!" (Japanese:絶体絶命 鉄壁のルフィ包囲網!) Directed by: Yoshihiro UedaStoryboarded by: Takahiro Imamura Hitoshi Tanaka February 10, 2019(2019-02-10)
transformers_text: 872 90 A Desperate Situation The Iron tight Entrapment of Luffy Transliteration Z etta i Ze tsu mei T epp eki no Ru fi H im Japanese Directed by Yoshihiro Ueda Story boarded by Takahiro Imamura Hitoshi Tanaka February 10 2019 2019 02 10 The Sunny crew reaches Cacao Island and in the Mir ro World Pe kom s tells Luffy he will activate his S ulong form to distract Oven's army Upon reaching Cacao Island Pe kom s ' distraction allows Luffy to run off and Sanji joins his captain Oven and his army eventually stop Pe kom s ' rampage and Sanji and Luffy are surrounded However the Germ a Kingdom then attacks Cacao Island and Ichi ji N iji Yon ji and Rei ju arrive to help their brother and his captain
